Text:
I really wouldn't take the time to download this file.  It is an extremely low-quality FLV to AVI conversion of the movie on this site (XENUTV): http://www.dailymotion.com/XENUTV/video/xkmax_scientology-the-elli-perkins-story

But, don't get me wrong, this IS an interesting topic and I found it extremely interesting to investigate.  I'm thankful it was made available here.
Worst quality video/audio I have ever encountered. I can hardly make out what is even on the screen.
